      • compute

        public static double compute(java.util.List<android.graphics.Point> points,
                             double scale,
                             int inputUnitIndex,
                             int outputUnitIndex)
        Based on a list of 4 points, computes the distance between the last 2 using the first 2 as a reference.
        Parameters:
        points - A List of 4 points
        scale - The value of the distance between the first 2 points
        inputUnitIndex - Input unit
        outputUnitIndex - Output unit
        Returns:
        The value of the distance between the last 2 points

      • convertUnits

        private static double convertUnits(int refUnit,
                                   int meaUnit,
                                   double measurement)
        Converts between units of length.
        Parameters:
        refUnit - The unit of the reference size
        meaUnit - The unit of the measurement size
        measurement - The measurement size
        Returns:

        Converts a value in a given unit to meters.
        Parameters:

        refUnit - The original unit.
        Returns:
        The length value in millimeters
